# Copilot Instructions

This Angular project is a job vacancy listing website with a minimalistic, stylish home page and an admin portal for managing job vacancies (CRUD).

## Features
- Home page: Minimalistic, stylish UI for browsing job vacancies
- Admin portal: Add, edit, and delete job vacancies

## Structure
- `/src/app/pages/home`: Home page component
- `/src/app/pages/admin`: Admin portal module and component

## Usage
- Home page is available at `/`
- Admin portal is available at `/admin`

## Next Steps
- Replace demo job data with backend integration
- Implement full CRUD functionality in admin portal
- Add authentication for admin access
